msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
- 2503314: Need to throw exception if linkFormat contains a child element other than <TextLayoutFormat>.
- 2503340: Need to throw exception when <Tab> contains a CData.
- 2504346: Exception message is incorrect when <content> is a child of a element that isn't <TextGraphic> or <RichText>.

- 2489484: FXGUtils appears to ignore the content of the value of tabStops attribute in the and

element.
- 2504795: FXGUtils fails to identify out of range value for the lineHeight attribute within <a>.
- 2504799: FXGUtils fails to identify out of range value for the lineHeight attribute within <div>.
- 2367509 (Processing order for mask/filter properties is different between MXML Graphics and FXGUtils.)
- 2504202 (Compiled FXG with mask doesn't properly mask all items)
- 2500579 (FXGUtils: SWF is generated for FXG with invalid scale-9 instead of erroring out)
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Integrating latest FXGUtils now that TLF 566 is in trunk (which includes a fix for TLF 2497992).
Made bitmap clipping implementation more efficient.
- #2491501 (Inconsistent word spacing results between MXMLC static and runtime compilation)
- #2492932 (MXMLC gets null pointer exception on this FXG)
- #2489341(FXG with a large BitmapImage results in a malformed SWF)
- Added code to break down straight edges whose dx or dy exceeds 65535 twips into smaller segments.
- #2495874 (many objects are missing in Opacity.fxg renders via MXMLC static compiler)
- FXGUtils now ignores gradient entries of more than 15 gradient entries.
- It logs warnings for such violations and continues processing.
QE notes: Yes, please remove whiteSpaceCollapse="preserve" from static FXG mustella test cases or please regenerate bitmaps.
Localization: No, there are just resource strings removed in this changelist, no new strings.

Tests run: Checkintests, mustella spark/core/fxg (25 failures all relating to tests that have whiteSpaceCollapse="preserve" but the reference bitmap do not expect this behavior and should be regenerated or tests modified).
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Integrating Sujata and Min's changes from the latest approved FXGUtils from CT changelist 633842.
- bug #2480280 (FXGUtils: pixelHinting setting to true for SolidColorStroke doesn't work.)
- bug #2479187(FXGUtils is drawing compiled FXG items is off by half a pixel)
- Fixed other instances of rounding errors from casting to int.
- Bug 2480289: Compiling richtext content markup in MXML with FlexSDK runtime option is throwing errors.
-  LinkFormats cannot be child of <content>, but child of <RichText>. 2.0 Spec. will be updated.
- There is a bug in FXGUtils where we currently don't throw an exception when LinkFormats are child of <content>. Fix it.
-  Bug 2480311: multiple instances of content tag under RichText should throw errors.
-  Bug 2478932: FXG Spec. change, add a new enum "approximateTextField" to RichText leadingModel attribute.
-  Bug 2477953: Improve rich text parsing error messages.
-  Bug 2477733: FXGUtils should report proper errors about misplaced attributes.
-  Bug 2478000: Update valid range for RichText trackingLeft and trackingRight according to FXG 2.0 spec. change. old range: -100 to 100. new range: -1000 to 1000.

- Bug 2477633: If a
tag has children, you do not get a compile error.
-  Bug  2477649: FXGUtils needs to support setting justificationStyle to prioritizeLeastAdjustment for RichText.
-  Bug 2477661: Incomplete error message when an invalid textAlign attribute value is provided.
-  Bug 2444256: FXG compiler fails on percentage lineheight inside formatted text content.
QE notes: Please investigate 2 mustella failures for FXG stroke tests.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fix for TextGraphicNode and RichTextNode delegated content property.  We used to pick up cdata from before and after the content tags and consider them content, this was wrong and the new line and tabs threw TLF for a loop.
This change will need to be communicated to and integrated with, CoreTech.

Remove ADOBE SYSTEMS license, if present, and insert Apache license - modules.  Will need another pass to convert files not handled by the scripts.
